home.title: Welcome to L'Orangeraie
home.description:
Laurence & Fabrice welcome you to their guesthouse
and wish you a pleasant stay.

nature.title: Nature
nature.desc: Double room with private bathroom, air conditioning and TV. Perfect for a stay for two.

atelier.title: Atelier
atelier.desc: Spacious triple room with a double and a single bed. Ideal for small groups or families.

coloniale.title: Coloniale
coloniale.desc: Connecting suite for 4 people with two bedrooms, ideal for family stays.

contact_teaser.title: A question about our rooms?
contact_teaser.text: Feel free to contact us — we reply quickly and gladly.

gite_section.title: Our Cottage
gite_section.desc: Discover our independent, comfortable and fully-equipped cottage, perfect for couples, families or groups of friends. Located in a peaceful setting with a terrace and garden view — ideal for a longer stay in the Pyrénées-Orientales.

bed.title: Comfortable bedding
bed.desc: Linens provided, beds made upon arrival

breakfast.title: 🍽️ Breakfast
breakfast.desc: Traditional French breakfast with coffee, tea, hot chocolate, pastries, bread, yogurt, orange juice and our 10 homemade jams, served in the garden or dining room.

arrival.title: 🕒 Check-in & Check-out
arrival.desc: Check-in from 5:30 PM. Rooms must be vacated by 10:00 AM.

payment.title: 💳 Payment methods
payment.desc: Checks, cash, ANCV holiday vouchers and ANCV Connect accepted.

beach.title: The beaches
beach.desc: Just 10 min away — enjoy fine sand and the Mediterranean sea.

collioure.title: Collioure
collioure.desc: The jewel of the Vermilion Coast — colorful alleys & its iconic port.

bike.title: Cycling paths
bike.desc: Plenty of scenic bike trails between sea and mountains.

alberes.title: Les Albères
alberes.desc: Hiking and stunning views over the Mediterranean coastline.

vineyards.title: Vineyards
vineyards.desc: Winery visits and tastings of local wines.

market.title: Elne Market
market.desc: Local products and Catalan atmosphere — every Wednesday morning.

chambres.title: Our Rooms
chambres.intro: Discover our five warm, comfortable rooms, lovingly decorated for an unforgettable stay.
chambres.labels: They are labeled with 3 Clés by CléVacances, a guarantee of quality and comfort.

about_stay.title: About your stay
about_stay.desc:
At L’Orangeraie, breakfast is a unique experience: served in the large lounge or in the garden, it invites you to discover a selection of around ten homemade jams, full of authentic flavors, lovingly prepared by your host.
Then enjoy the garden with free access, or take a refreshing break in the fully-equipped summer kitchen.

gite.title: Our Cottage
gite.intro1: Nestled in the heart of Elne, our independent cottage welcomes you in a warm and comfortable atmosphere. Perfect for families or longer stays, it offers all the necessary comfort in an authentic setting.
gite.intro2: The cottage includes a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, spacious bedrooms, and direct access to the garden.

equipments.title: Cottage amenities
list: 🛎️ 1 spacious bedroom and 2 beds in the living room

pricing.title: Cottage Rates
pricing.note: Indicative rates, contact us for a personalized quote.
details: 🗓️ Cottage rental: weekly, from Saturday 5:30 pm to Saturday 10:00 am.
💶 Payment methods: cheques, cash, holiday vouchers, digital holiday vouchers and bank transfer.

petit_dej.title: 🍽️ Breakfast
petit_dej.desc: Served in the garden or in the dining room. Pastries, hot drinks, orange juice, yogurt, bread, and our 10 homemade jams.

paiement.title: 💳 Payment Methods
paiement.desc: Checks, cash, ANCV holiday vouchers, Connect holiday vouchers, and bank transfer.

tables.title: 🍽️ Table d'hôtes
tables.desc: Enjoy a family-style dinner featuring regional dishes made with fresh local products.
tables.dispo: 📅 Availability: Sunday, Monday and Thursday evenings, by reservation 24 hours in advance (minimum 2 people).
tables.tarifs: 💰 Prices: €25 per adult · €15 per child under 12.

produits.title: 🛍️ Local Products
produits.desc: Also discover the artisan pasta and local beer made by your host!

activities.title: Activities Nearby
activities.intro: Elne and its region offer a wide variety of experiences: nature, culture, gastronomy, and relaxation... Here are some suggestions to enrich your stay at L'Orangeraie.

elne.title: 🏛️ Elne, City of Art and History
elne.desc:
As the former episcopal seat of Roussillon from 568 AD until the 17th century, Elne offers visitors a magnificent Romanesque cathedral from the 11th century and a cloister in white marble veined with blue.

Also a city of art, it is the birthplace of painter Étienne Terrus (1857–1922), friend of Matisse, Maillol, and Montfreid.

Elne is also home to a powerful place of memory: the Swiss Maternity Hospital, bought by the city in 2005. This site honors the courage of Elisabeth Eidenbenz of the Swiss Aid to Children, who welcomed over 600 children there during the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

nature.title: 🌿 Nature, Beaches & Relaxation
nature.p1: Just minutes away, enjoy the Mediterranean beaches like Saint-Cyprien, Argelès-sur-Mer, or Collioure. Sunbathing, swimming, or water sports – there’s something for everyone.
nature.p2: Nature lovers can explore the protected ponds of Canet-Saint-Nazaire or go hiking in the Albères mountains, the first foothills of the Pyrenees.
nature.p3: For a quieter break, enjoy a bike ride through the orchards or along the Tech river path, between river and countryside.

culture.title: 🎭 Local Markets & Culture
culture.p1: All year round, stroll through the traditional Roussillon markets to discover local products, crafts, and Catalan specialties. The Elne market takes place every Friday morning from 8am to 1pm, right below our guest rooms.
culture.p2: In summer, enjoy traditional festivals, open-air concerts, street performances, and art exhibitions in the town or nearby villages.
culture.p3: Highlights include Visa pour l’image in Perpignan in September, the Saint John’s Bonfires in June, and many summer village festivals just minutes from Elne.
culture.p4: Ask your host for more information about ongoing events during your stay!

sports.title: 🚴‍♂️ Outdoor Sports & Activities
sports.p1: Whether you're a thrill-seeker or a fan of peaceful strolls, the region offers a wide range of activities:
sports.p2: Tree climbing and artificial canyoning in Argelès-sur-Mer, natural canyoning in the nearby mountains, paragliding over the cliffs, hiking between sea and mountains, or kayaking and paddleboarding along the coast – all unforgettable experiences.

villages.title: 🌄 Hilltop Villages & Heritage
villages.p1: Discover picturesque villages like Castelnou, Eus, or Collioure, ranked among the most beautiful in France.
villages.p2: Cobblestone streets, artisans, citadels, and breathtaking views await you at every turn – a dive into Catalan authenticity and history.

conclusion.title: 🌅 A Region to Experience Fully
conclusion.text: Whether you seek nature, history, relaxation, or adventure, Elne and its surroundings will charm you. Enjoy a privileged setting between sea, mountains, and Catalan traditions.
